description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b by a later hand. Physical description: 19-23 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining. Manuscript is split in half between leaves 107-108. Origin: Texts 1-14, Muḥarram-Jumādá I 1214 H [1799] (leaves 130b, 191b, 227b, etc.). Texts 15-17, Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1215 H [1801] (leaf 260a). Texts 18-21, Ṣafar 1216 H [1801] (leaves 264a, 268a). All texts copied by the same scribe, Muḥammad Riḍā ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī (see, for example, leaf 130b).
author: Bahbahānī, Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Akmal, 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792
abstract: Collection of the author's works on law, ḥadīth, and doctrine.
contents: 1. leaves 3b-39a: Hādhihi Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Maʻālim uṣūl al-dīn.
2. leaves 39a-88a: Risālat Fawāʼid ʻatīq.
3. leaves 88a-100a: Risālah mufradah fī al-ijmāʻ.
4. leaves 100a-130b: Hādhihi Fawāʼid al-jadīdah.
5. leaves 131a-132a: Fawāʼid mushtamilah ʻalá baʻḍ masāʼil al-uṣūl al-fiqhīyah.
6. leaves 132a-133a: Risālah fī taḥqīq al-qiyās.
7. leaves 133a-137b: Risālah fī al-istiṣḥāb.
8. leaves 138a-145a: Risālah fī bayān ḥujjīyat al-shuhrah wa-ithbāt ḥujjīyat kull al-muẓannah.
9. leaves 145a-191b: Risālah al-musammāh bi-al-Ijtihād wa-al-akhbār.
10. leaves 191b-198a: Hādhihi Risālah fī al-akhbār wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā.
11. leaves 198a-218b: Fawāʼid rijālīyah.
12. leaves 219a-227b: Risālah fī aqsām al-jamʻ.
13. leaves 227b-241b: Risālah fī masʼalat aṣālat al-barāʼah.
14. leaves 241b-246a: al-Shubhah al-mushkilah wa-al-mughālaṭah al-muʻaṭṭilah allatī awradahā al-Ashāʻirah ʻalá al-Muʻtazilah.
15. leaves 246a-248a: Aḥādīth al-tasāmuḥ fī adillat al-sunan.
16. leaves 248a-251a: Muṣṭalaḥāt-i Vāfī dar asmā-yi rijāl. Chart of scholars in Arabic; extract from al-Wāfī.
17. leaves 251a-260a: Ḥāshiyat dibājat Mafātīḥ.
18. leaves 260a-260b: Fī anna al-aṣl fī al-ashyā al-ṭahārah wa-lā taḥtājju fīhā bi-dalīl.
19. leaves 260b-261b: Fī anna al-aṣl fī al-muʻāmalāt al-fasād.
20. leaves 261b-264a: Fī bayān ʻadam ṣiḥḥat ʻibādat al-jāhil.
21. leaves 264a-268a: Fī ʻadam jawāz taqlīd al-mayyit maʻa wujūd al-ḥayy wa-jawāzihi ʻinda faqdih.
extent: 268 leaves : paper ; 206 x 153 (152 x 95) mm bound to 210 x 155 mm
creator: Bahbahānī, Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Akmal, 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792
بهبهاني، محمد باقر بن محمد اكمل، 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants; yellow paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
